name: Strung Together v2
description:
This is the polished version of our game jam plus submission Strung Together!

Game Jam version: https://nombinary.itch.io/strung-together

Strung Together

Play as the red string of fate and pair the right people together!

Use either WASD and the arrow keys to move the string around (or if you're using a controller, use the right and left joystick).  Use the clues to figure out who to pair up with who. Tie yourself around both of the right ankles to complete the level! 

Team Members:

Hanna Aref, Jean Carnesecchi, Jiahe Xing, Nom Köhler, Teodor Ragnemalm
